# quadrature.spectral_density { #quadrature.spectral_density }

```python
spectral_density(
    A
    bins=100
    bw='scott'
    deg=20
    rtol=0.01
    verbose=False
    info=False
    plot=False
    **kwargs
)
```

Estimates the spectral density of an operator via stochastic Lanczos quadrature.

## Return {.doc-section .doc-section-return}

(density, bins) = Estimate of the spectral density at domain points 'bins'
